S.FORM: Peter Mutharika bulad demiad, Peter Mutharika, u misingkiway. 1940 a mihca nalecuhan u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Malawi ayza sa ci Peter Mutharika, micakat a demiad sa i 2014 a mihca 5 bulad 31 demiad. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government
